extendedInfo.description: White Unicorn is a Live Wallpaper.This live wallpaper auto rezise for all devices screen from 240x320 to tablet resolutionAlso you can set the speed of the live wallpaper in order to obtain the movement perfectly adapted to your phone model, Another useful feature is the ability to move the live wallpaper on the SD memory card. In this way, you can install on your phone all the Live Wallpaper that you want.Question & Answer:I have downloaded and installed it. How do I set it up as a Live Wallpaper?- go to your home screen;- press the menu button on your device;- select "Wallpaper";- select "Live Wallpapers";- search and select for " Live Wallpaper"- select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.Important:After you have installed and launched the live wallpaper, if you want to change the screen resolution:- Go to your home screen;- Press the menu button on your device;- Select "Wallpapers"- Select "Configure ....";- Select Set Size of Live Wallpaper:- Then click the back button on your Android device.System Requirement:There are two requirements to use live wallpaper:1) compatible hardware -- any phone that came with Android OS 2.0 or later should work fine. Anything that came with 1.5 / 1.6 may have problems. HTC Droid Eris, Hero, Legend, Spica, and their cousins are known to have problems, even when updated to Android OS 2.X.2) compatible OS -- Android OS 2.1 (Eclair) or later can use live wallpapersWe want to keep the app completely free, In order to keep free is ad supported and may contain ads in the notification tray and or home screen. This will help keep it free and help us bring you more cool apps like this in the future.You can delete the search shortcuts easily and without any effect for our app (Drag and Drop to the garbage).You can optout notification ads from: Airpush Optout : http://www.airpush.com/optoutLeadbolt Optout: http://opt.leadbolt.com/  SendDroid Optout: http://senddroid.com/opt-out/Tags: Live wallpapers White Unicorn Water Rain

reviews.comment: Bad deal. Poor image. Image does not change. Animated water only. Adware. Possibly malicious toolkit will get installed if u click yes u want iphone5.
reviews.author: Goldencat Ohio

reviews.title: Spammy
reviews.comment: They bombard you with spam right after installation. The app is also not the easiest to remove, go into Avast apps and remove from there

reviews.title: Too many permissions!!
reviews.comment: Nice wallpapper but you DO NOT NEED GPS LOCATION (and others) FOR A LIVE WALLPAPPER!!! Seriously, I have plenty of live wallpapers that require like almost no permissions and they run just fine... get with the program devs!
reviews.author: Victoria Miller

reviews.title: Less than a 0!!
reviews.comment: You Airpush Ads & use Moolah Media! And this wallpaper \"Needs\"to read my accts??!! I don\'t think so! It reads more than my accts. Uninstalled & reported.  Such a nice wallpaper, too. smh
reviews.author: A Google User
